title: Ticket #4025: condor_ckpt_probe missing
description:
The program condor_ckpt_probe is missing from our releases. It's called on the execute machine to help determine which machines are compatible for standard universe checkpoint/restart. The output of the program is used in the machine attribute CheckpointPlatform. When the program is missing, the value "N/A" is used.

The program went missing when we started compiling it statically to get more accurate results (#2901).
